column1: Scope 1, Part B: Direct Emissions from Mobile Combustion

This section includes emissions from all mobile combustion of fossil fuels purchased by the institution combusted within all vehicles owned and controlled by the institution as established in the introduction.

column17: Note: FY22/23 - FY24/25 are copied from FY 21/22 for projection purposes and to be changed for "what-if" purposes

column1: Σ Scope 1 Gas = campus gas + off campus gas
